Name: Abort Mode II
checklistText:
<size=22>ABORT MODE II</size>
(75,000 FEET TO 522,000 FEET)

BOOST INDICATORS MONITORED
ABORT LIGHT MONITORED
ABORT INDICATOR: RED

<size=20>ANALYZE SITUATION AND DECIDE:</size>
	ABORT OR NOT

ABORT CONTROL HANDLE: 			- SHUTDOWN
WAIT 15 SECONDS FOR THRUST DECAY
Retro Squibs 1, 2, 3, 4				- Verify ARM

ABORT CONTROL HANDLE: 			- ABORT
SEPARATION FROM LAUNCH VEHICLE
CNTL PWR RCS A, B					- ACME

Manuever to Reentry Attitude
RETRO PWR							- ARM
MAN FIRE RETRO					- PUSH

TIME DELAY 45 SECONDS

RETRO JETT							- ARM
JETT RETRO							- PUSH
MANEUVER S/C TO BEF ATTITUDE
INITIATE NORMAL RE-ENTRY

Start LANDING Checklist
